boardgame.description: In Cathedral, each player has a set of pieces of a different color. The pieces are in the shapes of buildings, covering from one to five square units. The first player takes the single neutral Cathedral piece and places it onto the board. Players then alternate placing one of their buildings onto the board until neither player can place another building. Players capture territory by surrounding areas that are occupied by at most one opponent or neutral building. A captured piece is removed and captured territory becomes off-limits to the opponent. The player with the fewest 'square units' of buildings that can't be placed wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 12 – The Family Gamers Podcast – The “Crate-y” Holiday Season
Episode 10: Does Board Game News Exist?

Family Games version with the beautiful wooden pieces. The box, board, and game pieces are all in excellent shape. The rules are warped/curvy from laying on top of the pieces. Actual shipping from zip code 48104 to your location via your preferred method.

1987 version in like new condition. Board and buildings are in unopened bags. All components look brand new. All wood components made in the Philippines. Wooden base has a cork bottom. Red box has very light shelfwear but is in very good condition. OR CHOOSE: The original 3D Brightway Products version - complete and in very good condition. Beautiful all wood components made in New Zealand. Wooden base has a felt bottom. Includes John Davidson promotional material. Red box is similar to BGG image 15216. Box has light wear and one wrinkle but is in good shape overall. Price $60.

At any rate, this is the classiest print of the game I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve seen; beautiful blonde and brown wooden pieces, and gothic prints titles on the box. The box has seen very minor wear, the pieces and board are all in great shape. I live in Portland, OR if you want to avoid shipping costs. Otherwise, due to the weight of all that wood, the shipping will likely be $11.35 flat rate to anywhere is the United States.

Size: Medium Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.
